summary: In hard times, a miller sells his daughter to the Devil. Protected by her purity, she escapes but is deprived of her hands. Walking away from her family, she encounters the goddess of water... See full summary »
cast: Anaïs Demoustier|Jérémie Elkaïm|Philippe Laudenbach|Sacha Bourdo|Olivier Broche|Françoise Lebrun|Elina Löwensohn
title: La doncella sin manos
